text:
:mega: Just a heads up that we released an update to the <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=HubSpot.hubl|HubSpot VS Code extension> that includes some general updates but also adds a “Beta” flag which you can enable to activate *in-line HubL code linting*.

Update to version 0.10.0 to try that out. Give me a shout if you have any issues!

Hi Jon,

Thank you! can you please help me on this :

Is there a way to get the record from hubdb based on latitude and longitude around 50 miles on this page <https://thejuicycrab.net/order-page>. Also how to print all data after getting from hubdb table in hubl.

Thank you
